verses.verse: In the beginning <S%H7225><s%> God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and <S%H853><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Now the earth <S%H776><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> formless <S%H8414><s%> and empty. <S%H922><s%> Darkness <S%H2822><s%> was on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the deep. <S%H8415><s%> God <S%H430><s%>'s Spirit <S%H7307><s%> was hovering <S%H7363><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the waters. <S%H4325><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let there be <S%H1961><s%> light, <S%H216><s%>" and there was light. <S%H216><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the light, <S%H216><s%> and saw <S%H3588><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%> God <S%H430><s%> divided the light <S%H216><s%> from <S%H996><s%> the darkness. <S%H2822><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> "day, <S%H3117><s%>" and the darkness <S%H2822><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> "night. <S%H3915><s%>" There was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> one <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let there be an expanse <S%H7549><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and let it divide <S%H914><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> from the waters. <S%H4325><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the expanse, <S%H7549><s%> and divided <S%H914><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were under <S%H8478><s%> the expanse <S%H7549><s%> from the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were above <S%H5921><s%> the expanse; <S%H7549><s%> and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the expanse <S%H7549><s%> "sky. <S%H8064><s%>" There was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> under the sky <S%H8064><s%> be gathered together <S%H6960><s%> to <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> and let the dry <S%H3004><s%> land appear; <S%H7200><s%>" and it was so.

God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the dry <S%H3004><s%> land <S%H776><s%> "earth," and the gathering together <S%H4723><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> "seas. <S%H3220><s%>" God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the earth <S%H776><s%> yield <S%H1876><s%> grass, <S%H1877><s%> herbs <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> and fruit <S%H6529><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> bearing <S%H6213><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> with <S%H834><s%> its seed <S%H2233><s%> in it, <S%H776><s%> on the earth;" and it was so.

The earth <S%H776><s%> yielded <S%H3318><s%> grass, <S%H1877><s%> herbs <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and trees <S%H6086><s%> bearing <S%H6213><s%> fruit, <S%H6529><s%> with its seed <S%H2233><s%> in it, <S%H4327><s%> after their kind; and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>
There was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> a third <S%H7992><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let there be lights <S%H3974><s%> in the expanse <S%H7549><s%> of sky <S%H8064><s%> to divide <S%H914><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> from the night; <S%H3915><s%> and let them be for signs, <S%H226><s%> and for seasons, <S%H4150><s%> and for days <S%H3117><s%> and years; <S%H8141><s%>
and let them be for lights <S%H3974><s%> in the expanse <S%H7549><s%> of sky <S%H8064><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> on the earth; <S%H776><s%>" and it was so.

God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> lights: <S%H3974><s%> the greater <S%H1419><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> the day, <S%H3117><s%> and the lesser <S%H6996><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> the night. <S%H3915><s%> He also made the stars. <S%H3556><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> them in the expanse <S%H7549><s%> of sky <S%H8064><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%>

and to rule <S%H4910><s%> over the day <S%H3117><s%> and over the night, <S%H3915><s%> and to divide <S%H914><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> from the darkness. <S%H2822><s%> God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>
There was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> a fourth <S%H7243><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> swarm <S%H5315><s%> with swarms <S%H8317><s%> of living <S%H2416><s%> creatures, <S%H8318><s%> and let birds <S%H5775><s%> fly <S%H5774><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> expanse <S%H7549><s%> of sky. <S%H8064><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> the large <S%H1419><s%> sea creatures, <S%H8577><s%> and every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moves, <S%H7430><s%> with which the waters <S%H4325><s%> swarmed, <S%H8317><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and every winged <S%H3671><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%> after its kind. <S%H4327><s%> God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Be fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and let birds <S%H5775><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"
There was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the earth <S%H776><s%> produce <S%H3318><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creatures <S%H5315><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> livestock, <S%H929><s%> creeping things, <S%H7431><s%> and animals <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> after their kind; <S%H4327><s%>" and it was so.

God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the livestock <S%H929><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and everything that creeps <S%H7431><s%> on the ground <S%H127><s%> after its kind. <S%H4327><s%> God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us make <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in our image, <S%H6754><s%> after our likeness: <S%H1823><s%> and let them have dominion <S%H7287><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and over the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and over the livestock, <S%H929><s%> and over all the earth, <S%H776><s%> and over every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in his own image. <S%H6754><s%> In God <S%H430><s%>'s image <S%H6754><s%> he created <S%H1254><s%> him; <S%H2145><s%> male and female <S%H5347><s%> he created them. <S%H1254><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them. <S%H430><s%> God said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H6509><s%> "Be fruitful, multiply, <S%H7235><s%> fill <S%H4390><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and subdue it. <S%H3533><s%> Have dominion <S%H7287><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> over the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and over every living thing <S%H2416><s%> that moves <S%H7430><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you every herb <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> which is on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of all the earth, <S%H776><s%> and every tree, <S%H6086><s%> which bears fruit <S%H6529><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed. <S%H2233><s%> It will be <S%H1961><s%> your food. <S%H402><s%>

To every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and to every bird <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and to everything that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> in which there is life, <S%H2416><s%> I have given every green <S%H3418><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> for food; <S%H402><s%>" and it was so.

God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> everything that <S%H834><s%> he had made, <S%H6213><s%> and, <S%H3966><s%> behold, it was very good. <S%H2896><s%> There was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning, <S%H1242><s%> a sixth <S%H8345><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
